metadata.title: CVE-2015-9019 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: In libxslt 1.1.29 and earlier, the EXSLT math.random function was not initialized with a random seed during startup, which could cause usage of this function to produce predictable outputs.

notes.note: sbeattie> upstream fixed this for xsltproc, but libxslt remains unfixed not clear what the security impact of this is

criterions.comment: libxslt package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-07-02').
